title: Quarto Quirks
text:
About
This Quarto book documents some of the ways I like to use Quarto for e-books, talk slides, and websites.
Search engines are extremely useful tools for answering similar questions. Here, I try to capture specific implementations that I have found useful in my own work.






Note



I now use Quarto regularly. But there are many, many things I do not yet know about how to use it most effectively.
